Package org.action.enquiry

Class EnquiriesManager

java.lang.Object
org.action.enquiry.EnquiriesManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquiryAction
public class EnquiriesManager extends Object implements EnquiryAction
This class implements the EnquiryAction interface to provide functionality for creating, managing, and responding to enquiries. Also handles persistence of enquiry data.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiriesManager

      public EnquiriesManager()
      Constructor for the EnquiriesManager. Loads enquiries content from the CSV file during initialization.

  • Method Details

    • store

      public void store()
      Stores the current state of enquiries to CSV file. Should be called when quitting the program.

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      public List<String> getEnquiriesByProject(user usr, String projectName)
      Gets enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the enquiries
      projectName - The name/ID of the project
      Returns:
      A list of strings containing the project name and enquiries information

      Counts the number of enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user requesting the count
      projectName - The name/ID of the project
      Returns:
      The number of enquiries for the project

      public List<String> getEnquiriesByUser(user usr)

      Parameters:
      usr - The user whose enquiries to retrieve
      Returns:
      A list of strings containing the user ID and enquiries information

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      usr - The user submitting the enquiry
      text - The text content of the enquiry

    • canReply

      public boolean canReply(user usr, String enquiryID, ProjectManager proMan)
      Checks if a user can reply to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      usr - The user attempting to reply
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to reply to
      proMan - Checking if the user is a project manager or project officer
      Returns:
      true if the user can reply, false otherwise

    • editEnquiries

      public List<String> editEnquiries(user usr, String newText, String enquiryId)

      Specified by:
      editEnquiries in interface EnquiryAction
      Parameters:
      usr - The user attempting to edit the enquiry
      newText - The new text content for the enquiry
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to edit
      Returns:
      A list of strings containing the result of the operation and any messages

    • replyEnquiries

      public List<String> replyEnquiries(user usr, String reply, String enquiryId)
      Adds a reply to an existing enquiry. It also checks if it is a HDB officer or HDB manager replying the enquiries
      Specified by:
      replyEnquiries in interface EnquiryAction
      Parameters:
      usr - The user replying to the enquiry
      reply - The text of the reply
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to
      Returns:
      A list of strings containing the result of the operation and any messages
